episodes.title: Lori Vallow Daybell LIVE | 'You LIAR': High Drama As Cult Mom Sentenced In Arizona Murder Plot
episodes.description:
Lori Vallow Daybell—the so‑called “Doomsday mom”—has received two additional life sentences in Arizona, each to run consecutively alongside her existing Idaho convictions. Already imprisoned for the murders of her children and a romantic rival, Vallow Daybell is now also condemned for conspiring to murder her estranged husband, Charles Vallow, and her niece’s ex‑husband, Brandon Boudreaux. During the sentencing, Judge Justin Beresky declared that her crimes—born of cult‑like beliefs and calculation—marshaled a “wake of destruction” across multiple states. He made clear: this woman should never be free. 

#DoomsdayMom #LoriVallowDaybell #MurderConspiracy #JusticeServed #TrueCrime #CultBeliefs #VictimsVoices #PrisonForLife #NoMercy #WakeOfDestruction
